import React, { useState } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-modal'; import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Hero.css' Modal.setAppElement('#root'); const Hero = () => { const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false); return ( < div className='hero' >

Sign-up for Financial Freedom Coaching Sessions

setModalIsOpen(false)} style={{ backgroundcol }} >
) } export default Hero
